description:
The MINI TRAXION features an openable design that allows you to install the rope while the pulley is connected to the anchor. It’s engineered with a cam system that can be locked in the open position transforming the device into a simple pulley, adding versatility to its functionality.

  • Cam grips dirty or icy ropes and can be locked in the open position for use as a pulley
  • Triple-action opening of the moving side plate is quick and easy, even with gloves,
  • Sheave diameter is 32mm
  • Working load as progress capture pulley is 2.5kN
  • Breaking strength as progress capture pulley is 4kN
  • Fits ropes 7 to 11mm
  • CE EN 567 and UIAA certified
name: Petzl Mini Traxion Progress Capture Pulley
